instructions: In the Albums tab, tap the Add button , then tap New Shared Album. Give the album a name, then tap Next. Choose people to invite, or type an email address or phone number, then tap Create.
In the Albums tab, select a shared album. At the bottom of the screen, tap People. Turn on Public Website.
In the Albums tab, select a shared album, then tap the Add button . Select all the items you want to add, then tap Done. Add a comment if you want, then tap Post.
In Albums, scroll to Shared Albums, then tap See All. Tap Edit, then tap the name of the album and enter a new one.
